channel.title: television broadcaster on Logotyp.us
channel.description: Recent content in television broadcaster on Logotyp.us

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
France tv Logo
France Télévisions is the French national public television broadcaster. It is a state-owned company formed from the integration of the public television channels France 2 and France 3, later joined by the legally independent channels France 4, and France 5. France Télévisions is currently funded by the revenue from television licence fees and commercial advertising. The new law on public broadcasting will phase out commercial advertising on the public television channels.
You can download theFrance tvlogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: France tv
item.description: France Télévisions is the French national public television broadcaster. It is a state-owned company formed from the integration of the public television channels France 2 and France 3, later joined by the legally independent channels France 4, and France 5. France Télévisions is currently funded by the revenue from television licence fees and commercial advertising. The new law on public broadcasting will phase out commercial advertising on the public television channels.
